# Mount (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Summoning Spells|summoning]])

**Level:** [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Summoner Spells|Summoner 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** V, S, M (a bit of horse hair)

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Effect:** One mount

**Duration:** 2 hours/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 315

You summon a light horse or a pony (your choice) to serve you as a mount (see the *Pathfinder RPG Bestiary*). The steed serves willingly and well. The mount comes with a bit and bridle and a riding saddle.
